permission.name: Upload Files
permission.description: Enables the upload of assets into categories

permission.name: Delete
permission.description: Enables removal of an asset, and the option to remove the original.

permission.name: Email
permission.description: Enables an email button that sends a link to an internal asset.

permission.name: Publish
permission.description: Enables the publishing of an asset to a specified set of servers.

permission.name: Share
permission.description: Enables the share button. Parent of email, embed, publish and social media share.

permission.name: Social Media Share
permission.description: Enables sharing to social networks such as Twitter or Facebook.

permission.name: Embedding
permission.description: Enables and embed button that provides HTML code for an asset.

permission.name: Quick Publish
permission.description: Enables the quick publish menu for rapidly publishing assets

permission.name: Map & Geo-location
permission.description: Enables access to asset latitude/ longitude and a mapping feature.

permission.name: Attachments
permission.description: Enables access to attachments associated with an asset.

permission.name: Show Badge
permission.description: Enables view the badges on Thumbnails .

permission.name: Video Timeline
permission.description: Enables access to video clips and metadata

permission.name: View Only Approved Assets
permission.description: Show only approved assets for users (or assets owned by them)

permission.name: Edit All Assets In Collection
permission.description: Allow editing of assets in this collection
